data.text:
@SteveDaines And what are you doing here?
https://t.co/dXz3r9QdM5
@SteveDaines So, Steve, are you going to speak up if the MT Guard is sent to intimidate voters at polling places?

@SteveDaines So then you agree it's despicable the Sec Interior, under orders from your Dear Leader, removes signage from Little Bighorn Battlefield National monument that depicts Natives as warriors and US Army as having lost the battle?
@SteveDaines Do something about the baby raping kid eating monsters

@SteveDaines FUND ICE NO RESTRICTIONS-if u Concede to the dems demands regarding ICE, Dont bother to pass SAVE,It Wont Be Enforced If ICE not at polls&dont bother Funding ICE because Repubs just Abolished ICE,stopped all arrests & deportations FOR Dems-please dont betray Citizens Again
@SteveDaines Tell @LeaderJohnThune The Save America Act is an 80-20 issue.

@SteveDaines If you really care about the Guard…
https://t.co/hku8WYtFxa

@SteveDaines We Iranians, after the #IranianMassacre, we are hopeful and united, under the leadership of a patriot #RezaPahlavi
we will continue our struggle until the freedom of Iran. We need you to recognize him as the leader of the opposition and work with him.
